Grid Auto Rows

# Grid Auto Rows

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                  | Support     |
| ---------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
auto-rows-auto
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
auto-rows-min
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
auto-rows-max
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
auto-rows-fr
```   | 🌐 Web only |
